data.description: Make a PPM package from a CPAN distribution
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There already is a PPM::* set of modules for installation of ppm
    packages; the choice of name for this module, which automates most
    of the steps for making a PPM package from a CPAN distribution
    (including building the HTML docs), either for distribution or
    installation, seems natural.
